member.name: T:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli
member.summary: A class for compressing and decompressing data using the brotli algorithm.

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.DecompressBuffer(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decompresses a byte array into a new byte array using brotli.
member.param: The byte offset in to read from.
The number of bytes to read.
The custom dictionary that will be passed to the decoder
member.returns: The byte array in compressed form

members.member:
Compresses a byte array into a new byte array using brotli.
The byte array to compress. The byte offset in to read from. The number of bytes to read. The quality of the compression. This must be a value between 0 to 11 (inclusive). The window size (in bits). This must be a value between 10 and 24 (inclusive). The custom dictionary that will be passed to the encoder.

member.name: F:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.BrotliDecoderResult.BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_ERROR
member.summary: Decoding error, e.g. corrupted input or memory allocation problem.

member.name: F:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.BrotliDecoderResult.BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_SUCCESS
member.summary: Decoding successfully completed

member.name: F:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.BrotliDecoderResult.BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT
member.summary: Partially done; should be called again with more input

member.name: F:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.BrotliDecoderResult.BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_NEEDS_MORE_OUTPUT
member.summary: Partially done; should be called again with more output

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.GetEndianess
member.summary: Detects the endianness of the current CPU

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.Brotli.IsWhitelistedCPU
member.summary: Determines if the current CPU supports unaligned reads

members.member:
Process input.
Encoder may postpone producing output, until it has processed enough input.

Produce output for all processed input.
Actual flush is performed when input stream is depleted and there is enough space in output stream. This means that client should repeat ::BROTLI_OPERATION_FLUSH operation until @p available_in becomes @c 0, and ::BrotliEncoderHasMoreOutput returns ::BROTLI_FALSE.
@warning Until flush is complete, client @b SHOULD @b NOT swap, reduce or extend input stream.
When flush is complete, output data will be sufficient for decoder to reproduce all the given input.

Finalize the stream.
Actual finalization is performed when input stream is depleted and there is enough space in output stream. This means that client should repeat ::BROTLI_OPERATION_FLUSH operation until @p available_in becomes @c 0, and ::BrotliEncoderHasMoreOutput returns ::BROTLI_FALSE.
@warning Until finalization is complete, client @b SHOULD @b NOT swap, reduce or extend input stream.
Helper function ::BrotliEncoderIsFinished checks if stream is finalized and output fully dumped.
Adding more input data to finalized stream is impossible.

Default compression mode.
In this mode compressor does not know anything in advance about the properties of the input.
Compression mode for UTF-8 formatted text input.

Tune encoder for specific input.
::BrotliEncoderMode enumerates all available values.

The main compression speed-density lever.
The higher the quality, the slower the compression. Range is from ::BROTLI_MIN_QUALITY to ::BROTLI_MAX_QUALITY.

Flag that affects usage of "literal context modeling" format feature.
This flag is a "decoding-speed vs compression ratio" trade-off.

Estimated total input size for all ::BrotliEncoderCompressStream calls.
The default value is 0, which means that the total input size is unknown.

member.name: T:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream
member.summary: Represents a Brotli stream for compression or decompression.

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified stream and compression mode, and optionally leaves the stream open.
member.param: The stream to compress or decompress.
One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.
true to leave the stream open after disposing the object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified stream and compression mode.
member.param: The stream to compress or decompress.
One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.

member.summary: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the .

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.SetQuality(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the quality for compression.

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.SetCustomDictionary(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the dictionary for compression and decompression.
member.param: The dictionary as a byte array.

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.SetWindow(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the window size for the encoder
member.param: The window size in bits (a value from 10-24)

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: Flushes any buffered data into the stream

member.summary: This operation is not supported and always throws a .

member.summary: This operation is not supported and always throws a .

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of decompressed bytes into the specified byte array.
member.param: The array to store decompressed bytes.
The byte offset in at which the read bytes will be placed.
The maximum number of decompressed bytes to read.
member.returns: The number of bytes that were read into the byte array.

member.name: M:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes compressed bytes to the underlying stream from the specified byte array.
member.param: The buffer that contains the data to compress.
The byte offset in from which the bytes will be read.
The maximum number of bytes to write.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports reading while decompressing a file.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports seeking.

member.name: P:BrotliSharpLib.BrotliStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports writing.

member.summary: This property is not supported and always throws a .
